verses.verse: And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> being full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> from Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> and was led <S%G71><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%>

Being forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%> And in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> he did eat <S%G5315><s%> nothing: <S%G3762><s%> and when they were ended, <S%G4931><s%> he afterward <S%G5305><s%> hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

And the devil <S%G1228><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> you be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> command <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> that it be made <S%G1096><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is written, <S%G1125><s%> That man <S%G444><s%> shall not live <S%G2198><s%> by bread <S%G740><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> but by every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the devil, <S%G1228><s%> taking <S%G321><s%> him up into <S%G1519><s%> an high <S%G5308><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> to him all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G3625><s%> in a moment <S%G4743><s%> of time. <S%G5550><s%>

And the devil <S%G1228><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, All <S%G537><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> you, and the glory <S%G1391><s%> of them: for that is delivered <S%G3860><s%> to me; and to whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> it.
If <S%G1437><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> will worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G1799><s%> me, all <S%G3956><s%> shall be yours. <S%G4675><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Get <S%G5217><s%> you behind <S%G3694><s%> me, Satan: <S%G4567><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> You shall worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God, <S%G2316><s%> and him only <S%G3441><s%> shall you serve. <S%G3000><s%>

And he brought <S%G71><s%> him to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and set <S%G2476><s%> him on <S%G1909><s%> a pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> you be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> down <S%G2736><s%> from hence: <S%G1782><s%>
For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He shall give his angels <S%G32><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> over <S%G4012><s%> you, to keep <S%G1314><s%> you:

And in their hands <S%G5495><s%> they shall bear <S%G142><s%> you up, lest <S%G3379><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> any <S%G3379><s%> time <S%G3379><s%> you dash <S%G4350><s%> your foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone. <S%G3037><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, It is said, <S%G2046><s%> You shall not tempt <S%G1598><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when the devil <S%G1228><s%> had ended <S%G4931><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the temptation, <S%G3986><s%> he departed <S%G868><s%> from him for a season. <S%G2540><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> in the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee: <S%G1056><s%> and there went <S%G1831><s%> out a fame <S%G5345><s%> of him through <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the region <S%G4066><s%> round <S%G4066><s%> about. <S%G4066><s%>
And he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> in their synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> being glorified <S%G1392><s%> of all. <S%G3956><s%>

And he came <S%G2064><s%> to Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he had been brought <S%G5142><s%> up: and, as his custom <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1486><s%> was, he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and stood <S%G450><s%> up for to read. <S%G314><s%>

And there was delivered <S%G1929><s%> to him the book <S%G975><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Esaias. <S%G2268><s%> And when he had opened <S%G380><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> it was written, <S%G1125><s%>

The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is on me, because <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1752><s%> he has anointed <S%G5548><s%> me to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to the poor; <S%G4434><s%> he has sent <S%G649><s%> me to heal <S%G2390><s%> the brokenhearted, <S%G4937><s%> <S%G2588><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%> deliverance <S%G859><s%> to the captives, <S%G164><s%> and recovering <S%G309><s%> of sight <S%G309><s%> to the blind, <S%G5185><s%> to set <S%G649><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> liberty <S%G859><s%> them that are bruised, <S%G2352><s%>
To preach <S%G2784><s%> the acceptable <S%G1184><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And he closed <S%G4428><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and he gave <S%G591><s%> it again <S%G591><s%> to the minister, <S%G5257><s%> and sat <S%G2523><s%> down. <S%G2523><s%> And the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> them that were in the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> were fastened <S%G816><s%> on him.

And he began <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to them, This <S%G4594><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> ears. <S%G3775><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> him witness, <S%G3140><s%> and wondered <S%G2296><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the gracious <S%G5485><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> proceeded <S%G1607><s%> out of his mouth. <S%G4750><s%> And they said, <S%G3004><s%> Is not this <S%G3778><s%> Joseph's <S%G2501><s%> son? <S%G5207><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You will surely <S%G3843><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> to me this <S%G5026><s%> proverb, <S%G3850><s%> Physician, <S%G2395><s%> heal <S%G2323><s%> yourself: <S%G4572><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> done <S%G1096><s%> in Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in your country. <S%G3968><s%>
And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, No <S%G3762><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> is accepted <S%G1184><s%> in his own country. <S%G3968><s%>

But I tell <S%G3004><s%> you of a truth, <S%G225><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> were in Israel <S%G2474><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Elias, <S%G2243><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> was shut <S%G2808><s%> up three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> and six <S%G1803><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> was throughout <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the land; <S%G1095><s%>

But to none <S%G3762><s%> of them was Elias <S%G2243><s%> sent, <S%G3992><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> to Sarepta, <S%G4558><s%> a city of Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> to a woman <S%G1135><s%> that was a widow. <S%G5503><s%>

And many <S%G4183><s%> lepers <S%G3015><s%> were in Israel <S%G2474><s%> in the time <S%G1909><s%> of Eliseus <S%G1666><s%> the prophet; <S%G4396><s%> and none <S%G3762><s%> of them was cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> saving <S%G1508><s%> Naaman <S%G3497><s%> the Syrian. <S%G4948><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> they in the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, were filled <S%G4130><s%> with wrath, <S%G2372><s%>

And rose <S%G450><s%> up, and thrust <S%G1544><s%> him out of the city, <S%G4172><s%> and led <S%G71><s%> him to the brow <S%G3790><s%> of the hill <S%G3735><s%> where on <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> their city <S%G4172><s%> was built, <S%G3618><s%> that they might cast <S%G2630><s%> him down <S%G2630><s%> headlong. <S%G2630><s%>
But he passing <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the middle <S%G3319><s%> of them went <S%G4198><s%> his way,

And came <S%G2718><s%> down <S%G2718><s%> to Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> them on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days.
And they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his doctrine: <S%G1322><s%> for his word <S%G3056><s%> was with power. <S%G1849><s%>

And in the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> there was a man, <S%G444><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of an unclean <S%G169><s%> devil, <S%G1140><s%> and cried <S%G349><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let <S%G1439><s%> us alone; <S%G1439><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> have we to do with you, you Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth? <S%G3478><s%> are you come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? I know <S%G1492><s%> you who <S%G5101><s%> you are; <S%G1488><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> One of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hold <S%G5392><s%> your peace, <S%G5392><s%> and come <S%G1831><s%> out of him. And when the devil <S%G1140><s%> had thrown <S%G4496><s%> him in the middle, <S%G3319><s%> he came <S%G1831><s%> out of him, and hurt <S%G984><s%> him not.

And they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2285><s%> and spoke <S%G4814><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> is this! <S%G3778><s%> for with authority <S%G1849><s%> and power <S%G1411><s%> he commands <S%G2004><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and they come <S%G1831><s%> out.
And the fame <S%G2279><s%> of him went <S%G1607><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> of the country <S%G4066><s%> round <S%G4066><s%> about. <S%G4066><s%>

And he arose <S%G450><s%> out of the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Simon's <S%G4613><s%> house. <S%G3614><s%> And Simon's <S%G4613><s%> wife's <S%G3994><s%> mother <S%G3994><s%> was taken <S%G4912><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> fever; <S%G4446><s%> and they sought <S%G2065><s%> him for her.

And he stood <S%G2186><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> her, and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the fever; <S%G4446><s%> and it left <S%G863><s%> her: and immediately <S%G3916><s%> she arose <S%G450><s%> and ministered <S%G1247><s%> to them.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when the sun <S%G2246><s%> was setting, <S%G1416><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> they that had <S%G2192><s%> any sick <S%G770><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> them to him; and he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, and healed <S%G2323><s%> them.

And devils <S%G1140><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of many, <S%G4183><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> out, and saying, <S%G3004><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> And he rebuking <S%G2008><s%> them suffered <S%G1439><s%> them not to speak: <S%G2980><s%> for they knew that he was Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And when it was day, <S%G2250><s%> he departed <S%G1831><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a desert <S%G2048><s%> place: <S%G5117><s%> and the people <S%G3793><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> him, and came <S%G2064><s%> to him, and stayed <S%G2722><s%> him, that he should not depart <S%G4198><s%> from them.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I must <S%G1163><s%> preach <S%G2097><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to other <S%G2087><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> for therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> am I sent. <S%G649><s%>
And he preached <S%G2784><s%> in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>
